title: o divya o divya  lyrics masilamani song lyrics
stanzas:
O divya O divya nee nadamaadum nile nadhiya
en nenjin oram aadava
O divya O divya nee kavi paadum pudhu nilava
Un sollil vedham thedavaa

En kangal oramaai vandhu en aayuil rehayil nindru
Dhinam thavam seiyum varam serpayaaaahh
Un paadha golusugal osai adhai padhivu seiyave aasai
Thirumugam kaati uyir kaapaayaaaahhh

O divya O divya nee nadamaadum nile nadhiya
en nenjin oram aadava
O divya O divya nee kavi paadum pudhu nilava
Un sollil vedham thedavaa

Ennakaga ennaipatri yosikathaan nee vandhaai
Azhagaga ennai maatri oruvam nee thandhaai
Verum kallaai vaalum ennai thotu sirpam seikiraai
Siru noolai aagum ennai alli aadai neikiraai
Eyalbaga pesumpodhu enake theriyaamal thaan unpeyarai solli pogirenn
Einipaana sumaigal thooki suvar yerum erumbai pola unkaadhal yendhi selhirenn

O divya O divya nee nadamaadum nile nadhiya
en nenjin oram aadava
O divya O divya nee kavi paadum pudhu nilava
Un sollil vedham thedavaa

MUdhal paarvai adhile siki innum veliye varavillai
Adharkul nee meendum paarthai ayyo mudiyavillaiiiiiih
Un asai thavalum muuchil uyirum vikki nindradhey
Un aavikamalam ange kangal sikki kondadhey
Midhurvana manjal penne rudhuvaana konjal kanney unakaagathaane valkiren
Nootraandu kadidham pola udhirkindra endhan manasaiunakaaga thirandhum vaikirenn

O divya O divya nee nadamaadum nile nadhiya
en nenjin oram aadava
O divya O divya nee kavi paadum pudhu nilava
Un sollil vedham thedavaa
